external_games.name: Jerry McPartlin: Rebel with a Cause

name: Jerry McPartlin: Rebel with a Cause
summary: Jerry McPartlin in Rebel with a Cause is an adventure game. Jerry McPartlin has a recurring dream of Wikvaya, a shaman. He asks Jerry to return to his hometown Barnett Springs, which he left after the disappearance of his parents many years ago to pursue his passion rock 'n' roll.
